mapper.select: SELECT q.MEMBER_CODE, q.QSTN_CODE, q.QSTN_TITLE, q.QSTN_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(q.QSTN_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') AS QSTN_DATE, q.QSTN_CONFIRM , q.QSTN_IMG, m.MEMBER_CODE, m.MEMBER_ID, m. MEMBER_PW, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM QUESTION q join members m on q.member_Code = m.member_Code WHERE q.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND q.QSTN_CODE = #{ qstnCode }
SELECT COUNT(QSTN_CODE) FROM QUESTION WHERE QSTN_CODE > 0
SELECT COUNT(QSTN_CODE) FROM QUESTION WHERE QSTN_CODE > 0 AND MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(QSTN_CODE) DESC) NUM, A.MEMBER_CODE,A.QSTN_CODE,A.QSTN_TITLE,A.QSTN_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(A.QSTN_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') AS QSTN_DATE,A.QSTN_CONFIRM,A.QSTN_IMG ,M.MEMBER_NAME FROM QUESTION A JOIN MEMBERS M ON A.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(QSTN_CODE) DESC) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{ cri.rowStart } AND #{ cri.rowEnd } AND MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(QSTN_CODE) DESC
SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_CODE FROM QUESTION WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QSTN_CODE DESC) NUM, A.* FROM QUESTION A ORDER BY QSTN_CODE DESC) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} AND QSTN_CONFIRM = '미답변' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(QSTN_CODE) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION VALUES( #{ memberCode} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(QSTN_CODE)),0)+1 FROM QUESTION) , #{ qstnTitle } , #{ qstnContent }, TO_DATE( #{ qstnDate } ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #{ qstnConfirm } , #{qstnImg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET QSTN_TITLE = #{ qstnTitle }, QSTN_CONTENT = #{ qstnContent } , QSTN_DATE = TO_DATE( #{qstnDate} ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , QSTN_IMG = #{qstnImg} WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND QSTN_CODE = #{ qstnCode }
UPDATE QUESTION SET QSTN_CONFIRM = '답변' WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND QSTN_CODE = #{ qstnCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM QUESTION WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode } AND QSTN_CODE = #{ qstnCode }
